item.title: A large branch has fallen from a willow tree, 24th July
item.description:
A large branch fell off a big willow tree in Priory Gardens Orpington today, near the main pond and near the benches. We had just finished feeding the ducks nearby and they had gone back in the pond when the branch fell, it could have hit a duck or a passer by feeding the ducks, branch looked rotten. I lifted it off the path and put it by the fence.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Court Road, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: I am writing to inform you about a longstanding issue that I have been experiencing with my neighbours for the past seven years. They are private tenants., 24th July
item.description:
I have repeatedly requested my neighbours to trim the trees in their garden, which have now overgrown and encroached upon my property. The untrimmed trees have led to fruits falling into my garden, creating an overgrown and forest-like appearance. Under the trees, there is a proper junkyard. The toilet seat, the entire sofa set, and the exercise machine are located, along with a lot of junk, under the trees.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sandpiper Drive, Slade Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet
